column5: General Management (BWL)Master of Science (M.Sc.)The study programme in General Management, leading to a Master of Science qualification, is intended for students who have completed a Bachelor's degree or Diplom in Business Sciences. It will qualify you to perform functions with leadership responsibility in companies and organisations as well as to undertake an academic career. It will also enable you to undertake a doctorate.PFH offers the three-semester Master's degree in General Management at Campus Göttingen. It is accredited by ZEvA, the Central Accreditation and Evaluation Agency, and state-recognised.
